```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, eval = TRUE, fig.align = "center", 
                      message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(patchwork)
library(ggfortify)
library(matrixcalc)
library(zeallot)
# Load files
source(file = "matrices.R")
source(file = "eigenvectors.R")
source(file = "eigenmetrics.R")
```

```{r, echo = F}
bool_plot <- T
M <- 10
```

## Stochastic Matrices

```{r, cache=T}
set.seed(23)
P <- rand_M_stoch(M, row_fn = r_zeros)
if(bool_plot){eigen_plot(P, loud = T, "Stochastic")}
```

\newpage

## Symmetric Stochastic Matrices

```{r, cache=T}
set.seed(23)
P <- rand_M_symm_stoch(M, row_fn = r_zeros)
if(bool_plot){eigen_plot(P, loud = T, "Symmetric Stochastic")}
```

\newpage

## Normal Symmetric Matrices

```{r, cache=T}
set.seed(23)
P <- rand_M_symm_norm(M, mu = 0, sd = 1)
if(bool_plot){eigen_plot(P, loud = T, "Normal Symmetric")}
```
